data.name: ServerController_Arma3_ServerCfg_PasswordAdmin_Description
data.value: Password to protect admin access via "#login <PASSWORD>".

data.name: ServerController_Arma3_ServerCfg_Password_Description
data.value: Password for the connection to the server.

data.name: ServerController_Arma3_ServerCfg_ServerCommandPassword_Description
data.value: Password required for the alternative syntax of serverCommand's server-side scripting (case-sensitive).

data.name: ServerController_Arma3_ServerCfg_Hostname_Description
data.value: Server name visible in the game browser.

data.name: ServerController_Arma3_ServerCfg_MaxPlayers_Description
data.value: The maximum number of players that can connect to the server. The final number is the smaller value between the number given here and the number of mission slots.

data.name: ServerController_Arma3_ServerCfg_Motd_Description
data.value: Message displayed when connecting to the server.

data.name: ServerController_Arma3_ServerCfg_Admins_Description
data.value: List of player uids (SteamID64) that are able to #login without providing a password.

data.name: ServerController_Arma3_ServerCfg_LocalClient_Description
data.value: Declares clients with unlimited bandwidth and almost no latency.

data.name: ServerController_Arma3_ServerCfg_FilePatchingExceptions_Description
data.value: List of player Uids (SteamId64) that are allowed to ignore the rules of allowedFilePatching and verifySignatures so they can join the server with any mods of their choice. Signature errors are still logged by the server on connection and can kick the user if the error occurs before the server knows the client's SteamID, e.g. if they try to join with completely unsigned pbo's.

data.name: ServerController_Arma3_ServerCfg_HeadlessClients_Description
data.value: Headless Client IPs. Im Falle mehrerer Headless Clients sind mehrere Verbindungen und Adressen zulässig.

data.name: ServerController_Arma3_Host_ServerMod_Title
data.value: Loads the specified subfolders for various server-side (not transferred to clients) mods. Separated by semicolons. Absolute path and multiple stacked folders are possible. In Linux, arguments for multiple folders require the following separator syntax: -mod=mod1\;mod2\;mod3.

data.name: ServerController_Arma3_Host_Port_Description
data.value: Port on which the dedicated server should listen.
